file_content.text: [This terminal controls the operations of the tugs' droid pilots.]
You owe me one, Senator Dodonna.
[Send tugs to Republic.]
Well, that was kind of anti-climactic.
The whole Republic owes you.
You don't want to just peek inside? Maybe pick up a little something? To remember it by....
Ooh, a man of honor after all....
Off to Port Nowhere. I bet Rogun the Butcher's never swiped a haul that big.
[Sell tugs for profit.]
Actually, there was this time when he--never mind.
It will make your name.
We are, uh, going to get to take our pick before you put the Nebula prototypes on the market, right?
I think even my father would be impressed.
Men... always comparing the size of their hauls....
Is this the one?
Here it comes.
Yes. Er... no. She's, um, an authorized repair tech sent by High Command....
Yes. Er... no. He's a, uh, captain in unit A-16. He'll be part of the fleet escort....
Surrender! You are in violation of the laws of the Sith Empire.
You want to explain what happened here?
Start talking, Tyrak.
I found this wanted criminal wandering the halls of a secured facility. He claims you were the instigator of the break-in.
I'm sure we can find some wiggle room in those laws, right...?
Let's work this out.
The laws of the Empire are inviolate.
Usually I stick to breaking the laws of the planet I'm on.
I'm not in the Sith Empire.
Balmorra is a protectorate of the Sith Empire. The word of the Emperor is law.
This isn't my fault! I was being helpful... I was scouting for guards.
It seems you found them.
Usually the point of scouting is to catch them before they catch you.
Shut up!
You make me look astonishingly competent.
Silence! Men, kill them--!
Thank me later.
